Yeshua is decieving the people!
Perhaps we should not be so rash.
No, this has gone on far too long.^We should not fear the people's wrath.^I will not be afraid of some charlatan masquerading as the Messiah!
PNAME, we've got to warn Yeshua, or He'll be arrested!
I'm your relief. You can take a break now.
Yeshua is in danger. The Priests and Pharisees are in power here.^We need to take Him away before they arrest Him!
My pen is out of ink! Quick, find me some more!
I'm late for an important meeting with the High Priest!
I'm very busy! Please bring me the coin bags from the storehouse.
The Priests will need this money to pay for all the sacrifices for tonight.
The festival is almost over. It's time to pack up my wares.
Thank you for loading my donkeys. That was very kind of you!
I forgot to bring a snack while I give my sacrifice today.
Those herb rolls were delicious!
We're out of perfume for the incense burners.^Would you retrieve a few bottles from the perfume mixers?
Ah, the pungent smell of incense...
We need to replace the loaves of bread on the Table of Showbread.^Would you bake some matzo in the ovens?
Only the priests may eat the leftovers.^I wish we could give it to someone else. I hate the taste of frankincense.
All this sacrificing is hard work! Have anything to eat?
Fresh, crisp apples were just what I needed.
Please bring me the scrolls from the Temple archives.^The final rituals are tonight and the High Priest must practice.
Magnificent. God's Word is our greatest treasure.
All the grain offerings from the people will be burned tonight.^Please load the carts with grain.
Well done. Almost everything is ready for the proceedings tonight.
The sheep need to be inspected for blemishes.
Only the best sheep can be offered to God. May God shine His face upon you, Child.
I have nothing to offer the Temple as a tithe!
With these rings, I'll be able to show my appreciation for God's forgiveness!
I'm collecting prayer shawls for the priests.^Would you like to donate some?
These shawls are lovely.^God's love truly shines from you and your friends!
I've been waiting for hours to give my sacrifice!^I really need a snack to tide me over.
That snack was fantastic! Blessings during your Feast Day!
I am with you for only a short time, and then I am going to the One who sent me.^You will look, but you will not find me.
What does he mean?
Where does this man intend to go that we cannot find him?
Perhaps he will go to our people scattered among the Greeks?
We’re too late. Look! The guards are already here!
Let anyone who is thirsty come to me and drink.^Whoever believes in me, as Scripture has said, rivers of living water will flow from within them.
Surely this man is the Prophet!
No, He’s the Messiah!
That’s impossible. How can the Messiah come from Galilee? Scripture says the Messiah will be born in Bethlehem!
With the crowds in an uproar, they might riot if we arrest him...
Why didn’t you bring him in?
No one ever spoke like this man does.
Speaking of the Law, should we really condemn Him before we know of His deeds?
Has he deceived you too? Not one of the Rulers of the Pharisees have believed him.^That mob knows nothing of the Law. They are cursed.
Nicodemus, are you from Galilee, too?^Read the Scriptures. There is no prophet from Galilee.
PNAME! I just overheard the Pharisees talking.^They're plotting something to trap Yeshua!^They want an excuse to arrest Him. We've got to warn Him!
The Temple torches left ashes all over the ground.^We should do our part and clean it up.
The ground is cleaner than ever!
The Priests haven't had breakfast. Would you bring me some eggs?
This will do nicely. Blessings on your Feast Day.
In their rush to finish their sacrifices,^the Priests forgot to put the lids back on the storage barrels.
Thanks for the help!
The Romans are scared the people will revolt.^Please prepare the warhorses, just in case.
We need to be on guard during the Feast. Lots of innocents could be hurt.
I forgot my lunch at home. It's going to be a long day...
Is this for me? That's very generous of you!
That ox knocked over all my wares!^We better clean this up before someone cuts their feet.
You're the most helpful person I've met today.
I have nothing to eat. Could you spare any alms?
Thank you, kind stranger. May God shine His face upon you!
My Temple tithes are due. Please collect my gold dust from my merchant stalls.
I'm glad I have so much to give to God.^I'd hate to be like those poor sinners in the streets.
I can't give my cow to the Priests with so much dirt on her!
I'll be proud to present my sacrifice with my cow so clean!
The Priests will be working late into the night.^Let's light the lamps for them.
Elohim, let your light shine before men, that we may know your glory!
Do you have any pomegranates?^I'm giving them to God today.
God will like my sacrifice. He loves me and always takes care of me!
I've been charged with making new Priestly garments.^Could you help me shear my sheep for their wool?
My sheep have the softest fleeces in Israel.^The Priests will be very comfortable.
All these people are interfering with our Temple construction!^Where did I leave my wood panels?
Thanks for finding my panels. Herod's deadlines are very strict.
No one gets access to the scrolls without permission from the Priests!
I see... Alright, you're free to read the Temple scrolls.
You there! Bring me the Temple scrolls for the High Priest.^I'm too busy to find them myself.
Well done. You'd be a fine priest, if you were a Levite.
Are the guards bothering you for permission to access the scrolls?^Here, take this note. He'll let you pass.
Please don't hurt me!
Rabbi, this woman was caught in adultery.^In the Law, Moses commands us to stone such women.^Now what do you say?
Whoever among you that has no guilt, let him throw the first stone at her.
Our worship must be given with a loud noise.^We need more trumpets for the ceremony!
Thank you for your donations. Praise Adonai our Healer!
I'm about to offer my yearly savings for the Temple.^Do you know anyone that would like to join me?
Thank you Elohim for your provision.
My poor dog hurt his leg. Does anyone have any bandages?
Let's get these bandages on you... Good boy!^Thanks for your help, PNAME.
Stop ignoring us!^What will you do? Will you execute her?
Madam, where are they? Did no one condemn you?
No one, Sir.
Neither do I condemn you.^Go, and from now on, do not sin anymore.
The crowds are getting angry at Yeshua's teaching.^PNAME, ask Thomas if we can make an escape route for Him.
The rest of my sheep were turned away because of blemishes.^But I can still make a profit from their fleeces.
With this, I'll have enough money until next year!
Would you gather the eggs from my chickens?^I haven't made dinner yet.
I'll have a hearty meal with all these eggs!
The wind is always blowing through here and scattering my tax forms!
You didn't need to help me, but you did anyway.^Thank you!
I don't have any more grass to feed my cows!
Bless you for finding me this grass!^I don't want my cows to starve.
I'm about to leave town and collect berries.^Do you have any baskets I can borrow?
Safe travels, PNAME.
This is God's holy Temple!^We can't have spiders crawling around during the Feast!
We've had a lot of pest problems lately... That Yeshua is the biggest one of all.
The bronze lavers are dirty from all our washing the past week.^Please bring me fresh water.
The bronze lavers teach us to reflect on our sins.^Fresh water represents God's truth.
I'm collecting donations for the temple.^But I don't have any bowls to store the money.
Thank you! With these bowls, I can collect generous donations from the crowds.
I'd like to learn more about the Anointed One foretold by the Prophets.^Do you know anyone who wouldn't mind lending me their scripture scrolls?
I'm learning a lot about God lately! Thank your friends for all their help!
We should decorate the courtyard for the rituals tonight!
The flowers are wonderful! Praise Elohim for bringing us out of Egypt!
Do you have anything to eat?^Please, I'm very hungry.
I haven't had something so delicious in months!^The Lord bless you, PNAME.
What should I say?
Everyone must choose a side. Follow Yeshua, or deny Him.
He can do miracles but you can't. How can you say He's the one causing trouble?
That Yeshua has been causing trouble this entire week!^Why won't he just go away?
Yeshua only spouts nonsense bordering blasphemy.^I wouldn't be surprised if he gets stoned by the Pharisees.
He's not performing miracles! He's only fooling people with magic tricks!
Yeshua looks like he's in trouble.^We need to open that side gate so we have an escape route!
Yeshua, over here!
I am the light of the world. Whoever follows me will never walk in darkness, but will have the light of life.
You're speaking as your own witness. Your testimony is not valid!

Even if I testify on my own behalf, my testimony is valid, for I know where I came from and where I am going. ^In the Law it is written that the testimony of two witnesses is true.^I am one who testifies for myself; my other witness is the Father, who sent me.
Where is your father?
If you knew Me, you would know my Father also.
He says "Where I go, you cannot come". Will he kill himself?
You are from below. I am from above.^You are of this world, but I am not.
Well, who are you then?
Exactly what I've been telling you from the beginning.
What is this nonsense he's talking about?
When you have lifted up the Son of Man, then you will know that I am He.
Is this Man the Messiah? He must be the Savior of Israel!
Well, who are you then?
Exactly what I've been telling you from the beginning.
What is this nonsense he's talking about?
When you have lifted up the Son of Man, then you will know that I am He.
Is this Man the Messiah? He must be the Savior of Israel!
You're a Samaritan and demon-possessed!
Even Abraham and the Prophets died.^Are you greater than Abraham?^Just who do you think you are?
Your father Abraham rejoiced at the thought of seeing my Day; he saw it and was glad.
How have you met Abraham? You're not even fifty years old!
This is the truth:^Before Abraham was born, I AM!
Hurry, Yeshua! Come through here!
If you hold to my teaching, you are really my disciples.^Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.
How can we be set free? None of us have ever been slaves!
Everyone who sins is a slave to sin.^But if the Son sets you free, you will be free indeed.^I tell you what my Father tells me, and you do what you have heard from your father.
Abraham is our father!
Abraham's children would not be trying to kill me.
We aren't illegitimate children!^God Himself is our Father.
If God was your Father, you would love Me.^The reason you cannot hear me is because you don't belong to God.
I am going away, and you will look for me, and you will die in your sin.^Where I go, you cannot come.
If you do not believe that I am the One, you will indeed die in your sins.
If you do not believe that I am the One, you will indeed die in your sins.
I am not possessed.^I honor my Father and you dishonor me.^But whoever obeys my word will never see death.
Is it true? Is Yeshua here?^I can find my way to Him, but I'm nervous.^Would you introduce me?
I'm waiting on a new outfit being put together by the tailor.^I need some matching Jewelry to go with it.
I'm sure this will go well with my new outfit.
I broke my lamp last night.^Can you bring me some replacements?
It'll be much safer at my house tonight!
This blind man's affliction must have been caused by sin.^I wonder if the sin lies with him or his parents...
My stomach's been empty all morning.^Might I bother you for some fresh Peaches?
Mmm... delicious. Thank you for the peaches.
Yeshua, there's a blind man who would like to meet you.
Andrew, we must go and meet him.
Very well. Let's go meet our new friend.
Someone accidentally knocked over my cart of cabbages.^I need help if I'm to make it to market in time!
Thank you for your kindness.^I don't know what I would have done.
What a mess! My collections are all over the place!^Help me collect all my gold before someone steals it!
Thanks for your help PNAME! You saved my day.
I'm collecting dolls for the needier kids in the neighborhood. Do you have any to donate?
Thank you for your help!^ I'm sure the children will appreciate it.
I heard that your Hometown makes some of the most delicious herb rolls.^Would you mind if I sampled one?
This herb roll lives up to its reputation!
I'm looking for a slingshot for my son's birthday.^Do you know where I can get one?
This is a sturdy slingshot.^Thank you for helping make my son's birthday special.
My friend, go and wash in the Pool of Siloam.
PNAME, would you please gather some clay and place it on the ground over there?
Rabbi, who sinned that this man was born blind?^His parents or himself?
No one sinned, Andrew.^This happened so the work of God would be displayed in his life.^During the "Day", we must do the work of my Father who sent me.^"Night" is coming, when no one can work.
There are some new items that you can make now here in our Hometown.^However, there is a Blind Man that is in need of your help!
It's amazing! Yeshua healed that man's blind eyes with mud!^Most of the people in Jerusalem have never seen Yeshua's miracles.^Let's see what they have to say at the Synagogue.
We should save the torches for later. Could you snuff them out?
They say a beggar was healed by some strange man from Galilee yesterday...
With all the crowds, my shipment to Jericho is late!
Bless you, friend! If my goods don't sell soon, I'm ruined.
My jar is leaking water. Could you find me some resin to patch the leak?
Thanks! This jar is the last one I have.
My restaurant ran out of butter!
There's so many people here for the Feast, my business is booming!
A surfeit of skunk wandered into the city.^We've got to drive them out before they stink up the place!
You have a knack with animals. Thanks for the help.
I much too busy to finish my mosaics on time!^You look like a helpful person. Could you finish my mosaics?
Well done! You must be a professional.
Perfume would be the perfect surprise to impress my husband.
This fragrance is beautiful! My husband will be so impressed!
I'm crafting a new breed of wine.^Might you find me a few fresh grapes?
These grapes have a bittersweet essence, perfect for my new wine!
It will be dark soon. Can you light the lamps near the Synagogue?
None of the market shops have any bread pudding left.^Do you know where I might find some?
Your bread pudding is the best I've ever tasted!
I'm going to skip rocks on the water today!^Do you have any small stones?
The Pool of Siloam is perfect for skipping rocks!
Jerusalem is a growing city. We need more sundials for the new areas of town.
The sundials you donated will help us stay on schedule.
map end script stuff.
i end the map
Isn't that the same man who used to sit and beg?^I saw him yesterday. He was blind!
I am that man, but now I see!
That's impossible! How were your eyes opened?
No, it can't be him. He only looks like him.
You need to come with us. The Rabbis need to speak with you.
The day you were healed was a Shabbat day.^How did you gain your sight?
The man called Yeshua put mud on my eyes.^When I washed it off in the Pool of Siloam, I could see!
Where is this man?
I don't know.
He put mud on my eyes, and when I washed it off, I could see.
This man isn't from God. He doesn't respect Shabbat!
But how can a sinner do such miraculous things?
What do you have to say about him? You were the one who was healed.
I think He is a prophet.
Thank you. It's been so long since I've had apples to eat.
I miss the taste of Pomegranates.^Do you have any?
These are so sweet. Thank you very much.
I'm working on a new statue, but I've had to stop.^My last Chisel broke and I won't be able to continue until I get a new one.
Thank you for the new Chisel.^I can continue my work now.
Yeshua has had a lot of problems lately. Maybe I can help.^There's a valley outside the city. Come see me there sometime soon.
My rope has been scattered by all these donkeys!^Help me gather up all the rope.
Thanks for helping me. I can get them cleaned up and ready for sale now.
I collect Eagle Feathers. I think they are beautiful.^ Do you have any you can add to my collection?
These look amazing. And they are in great shape.
Please hurry my Lord.
These are rough times for our family.^It's been so bad, I'm not sure how I'll be able to feed my kids today.^Can you help me? They are out by the fruit trees trying to get some fruit.
Thank you for helping my children.^I am not sure what tomorrow will bring but I am grateful for God's blessing today.
I'm starving for Peaches.^Peaches are my favorite!
Thank you for the Peaches.^I've been craving them so much.
I can't reach the Apples in the trees, can you help me?
A strange man dressed in white was looking for you.^I think he's back there deep in the woods.
Please help! I've been trying to find my way home for hours!
Thank you for drawing this map! I've been walking in circles.
Let's go see what he wants, PNAME.
It looks like that gate up there needs more than one person to unlock.^If you find the keys, I'll help you unlock the gate.
This place is really spooky...
Is that the mysterious man we're looking for?
You found the keys? Let's get going.
So good of you to meet me here, friend.^Are you still following Yeshua?
Yeshua is the Messiah. Who else would we follow?
My brother is dying. Do you have any prayer shawls?
With these prayer shawls, I'll gather my friends to pray for my brother's healing!
It's very cold out here! Do you have a cloak I can have?
Thanks for the cloaks!^But beware! There is an evil spirit haunting these woods.
This isn't over. Yeshua will fail His task, I'll make sure of that.
What should I say?
Yeshua is the One and Only Son of God!
My place is to serve God, not myself!
Yeshua is nobody! I'm the one you should fear!
Yeshua is a good man, but He is not the Messiah.^How would you like to be the Messiah, PNAME?^Why follow someone else when you can be the leader?
Will you still follow that weakling, PNAME?^I'm the King of Darkness.^With my help, I could give you anything you ask for…
The Lord rebuke you, Satan!
He's a demon, PNAME! Run!
I was so scared, PNAME.^I'm ashamed that I left you to face Satan alone.^Please forgive me.^We need to tell Yeshua what happened...
I want a snack! Do you have some peaches?
Wow! These peaches taste great!
Yeshua is staying at my home tonight.^I'd like to impress him with a beautiful vase.
This vase is lovely. Did you craft it yourself?
A pack of wild dogs spooked my flock.^They'll calm down if we give them some water.
You're very good with animals, PNAME.
The lamps were burning all night and left ash everywhere!
Nice clean up job... for a Jew.
I'm so hungry...
Bless you, stranger! I can't thank you enough for your kindness.
I can't find my fishing hooks!
Thanks for the new fishing hooks. I'll make a big catch today!
My mommy wants vegetable sauce to make dinner tonight.
She'll be so proud I found vegetable sauce!
I'm embarrassed to wear these rags, but they're all I have.
Is this cloth for me? May God bless you and your family!
Yeshua keeps talking about His death.^What if someone is plotting to kill Him?
What Should I Say?
God is guiding Yeshua. If He dies, it will be part of God's plan.
He preaches a gospel of peace. Why would anyone plot to kill Him?
But how can the Messiah take over the world if He's dead?
Many people are jealous of His influence.^Some of them might be willing to kill to stop Him.
Yeshua! You won't believe what just happened!
You did well, beloved.^PNAME, you overcame temptation and resisted the Devil.^Ruth, do not be afraid, my daughter.^God is your protector.
I'm so sorry, Yeshua. I failed you and PNAME.
You are forgiven, my friend.^In the days to come, you conquer many spirits of darkness.^I have a story to tell you both.^After John baptized me, the Holy Spirit drove me into the wilderness...

My friends, I'm sending you to the towns of Judea. Tell them "The Kingdom of God of near!"^The Harvest is plentiful, but the workers are few.^If they listen to you, they listen to me.^But if they reject you, they also reject me.^Truly I tell you, resist the Enemy and he will flee from you!
Quick, PNAME! We need to find a way out of town!^They rejected Yeshua's gospel and the town is rioting!
There's sharp glass everywhere!^We've got to clean it up or we might cut our feet!
Nice work, PNAME. I'm glad you're here.
Just like Yeshua said, God is our protector. Hallelujah!^We need to find another way out of town.
Help! The mob ran me over!
Thank you for the crutches!^You are the true followers of God!
lightning mob sees ruth and player
That's them! You won't escape!
What's going on over here?
Those two have been spewing blasphemy about God and the Messiah!
I won't have any riots breaking out on my patrol!^Go back home, all of you!
There must be another way out of town...
Praise the Lord! Good thinking, PNAME.
There they are! You aren't getting away!
Lord, save us from destruction!
Stop right there! You'll pay for your blasphemy!
Our town needs sundials. Bring me some, or I'll turn you in to the mob!
How can you be so kind to me?^The message of love you preach must be the truth.^Forgive us for driving you out of town.
Spring will be here soon. I need seeds to start planting my fields.
With these seeds, I can make a plentiful harvest this year!
Do you have any alms to offer? Everyone is ignoring my begging...
You are a true blessing from God!^Everyone here has rejected you, but you cared for me anyway.
We did it, PNAME! It was just like Yeshua said.^God not only used us to preach but to do miracles too!^Let's gather the other disciples. I can't wait to hear what Yeshua has to say next!
I know I need to eat vegetables, but they are too hard for my teeth.^Can you think of a healthy meal that won't hurt my sensitive teeth?
Of course! Oven roasted vegetables! Why didn't I think of that?
I don't know where these weeds keep coming from.^Can you help me clear them out before they choke out my crops?
Thanks. Weeds are like bad friends. I can't let them ruin my good soil!
Hey, I heard Yeshua was having another gathering and I was hoping to get some of that famous fish.
Hey, this fish is pretty good. Maybe I'll stick around to hear what Yeshua has to say.
John was nervous at first, but by the end he was preaching more boldly than I was!^We're heading over to hear Yeshua now. See you shortly.
The people were so receptive to Yeshua's message, and even donated a little cash too!^We'll wait for you by Yeshua.
It was such an honor to be a vessel for God's preaching and power.^We can't wait to tell Yeshua!
Witnessing to rowdy people is tougher than Tax Collecting, and more rewarding too!^We'll meet you over there.
I'm excited to hear from Yeshua. Let's gather the other disciples as well.
Yeshua anointed us to do signs and wonders,^but the biggest miracle was that Andrew's fish breath didn't scare away the townspeople.^My brother knows I'm teasing him. See you over there.
One town tried to stone us. But after dusting our shoes off a boulder rolled down and crushed their monument.^Ironic isn't it. We should never try to bring harm to God's anointed.
Teacher, we all went out and preached just like you told us to.^Lord, even the demons submit to us in your name!

I saw Satan fall like lightning from Heaven^and now I give you authority to overcome all his power so nothing will harm you.^Heavenly Father I praise you, Lord for hiding these things from the wise and revealing them to little children.^All things have been given to me by my Father. He alone knows me.^Only I know my Father, along with those I choose to reveal Him to.
Many past prophets and kings wanted to see what you did but did not. My disciples, your eyes are blessed.
I love olives. So much so, even my clothes are colored olive.^But I haven't been able to satisfy my craving since I've been out here with Yeshua.^Do you have any?
Thank you for the olives. Being out here has taught me that I should not let my love of olives consume me.^From now on I will only be mastered by my love for Yeshua and nothing else.
Me and a few friends came from our home town to write thank you letters to Yeshua and His disciples.^But, after coming all this way, can you believe we forgot pens?
First Yeshua's disciples bring us good news, and now they bring us pens?^Is there anything that God doesn't provide? Thank you Lord!
I picked all these beautiful flowers but I have nothing beautiful to put them in.
Looks like you gathered everyone.^Now let's hurry over to tell Yeshua what happened. I wonder what He'll say!
You brought this beautiful set of vases, for me? Thank you!
My co-workers helped me stuff wool in the crate boxes,^but then they all left for another job, leaving the hard work to me.^Can you help me pack the carts?
You saved my job! Now my shipment can make it on time to Jerusalem!
That large crowd sure left a lot of trash to be so-called "clean" people.
Wow, a disciple went out of the way to clean up after others?^Maybe being a follower of Yeshua is not so bad...
I can't believe we survived!^We should tell Yeshua about our confrontation with Satan.^Let's get going!
I'm not sure how much longer I can keep this up PNAME.^I know Yeshua told us to go preach the Gospel but we almost died in that last city!
Why, I would love to hear what you have to say. This should be quite interesting.
Well, I have nothing better to do. Whatever you have to say I hope it's good.
I wasn't going to listen to you teach until I heard you help that mean man with the blue crabs.^There must be love in your message and I want to hear it.
My daughter and I have been so depressed lately. We can use an uplifting message about now.
Please gather the townspeople. We could use a positive message during these rough times.
Oh wonderful. Everyone is here!^Please take this key to the city and use any materials you may need to teach.
Can you believe they welcomed us?! Now all we need is a place to preach.^See if you can make material from that carpenter's table to build us a pulpit.

Good townspeople. The Kingdom of God is at hand!^We have all sinned and as a result, we all deserve God's Judgment for breaking His holy commandments.^But the Almighty has shown His grace and mercy by sending us a Messiah, Yeshua, His only Son.^He was sent to pardon our sins and we will confirm our words by demonstrating God's power!
I hear you two are here to deliver good news.^We love good news! Please gather the townspeople then set up your pulpit. We'd love to hear your message!
We are so pleased to have you bring your good message.^If we knew you were coming we would have had refreshments waiting.^Please help us set up the meal tables. We can't wait to hear your teaching!
The dining tables look so nice.^We can't wait to hear what you have to say!
It's been a long day and I could really use a bite.^I hear your hometown makes a fine fish dinner, would you happen to have any?
Our town knows good sea food, and this meal is incredible!
Hey you! Yes you... the peculiar looking stranger.^I hope what you have to say is less annoying than these blue crabs.
You got rid of the blue crabs?^Maybe you aren't as annoying as you look... I mean... thanks.
Hear your message about Yeshua? We'd love to!
Hello stranger. I would love to listen to your new teaching...^...that is, if you're providing lunch.
You mean the Son of God is here now and wants to freely forgive my sins?!^No matter what I've done?! That is good news!
What's a warm welcome without music?^Might your friends have extra harps so we can give you the greeting you deserve?
Bless you stranger. We will strum you the finest melody you've ever heard on this side of the Roman Empire!
I would hear you preach but I can't find any cans to water my crops.
Wow, I didn't think you'd really bring me watering cans.^You must really be one of God's children!
What should I say?
You're right PNAME. Forgive me for ever doubting.^In the good or the bad, we should do what Yeshua says because He knows best.
I don't care if it's a town of 10,000 of the meanest Roman persecuters. If God is for us they will all fall!
Take courage Ruth. Yeshua delivered us from the last town for a reason. God will certainly bless our message this time!
Good news? For a leper like me? I will walk over immediately!
im blind, go talk to ruth first
I can see! Can you believe it?!^The power of El Shaddai moves mightily through you!
im the leper talk to ruth first
I'm healed! I'm clean! Truly your words are from God above!
kids possessed, talk to ruth first
My daughter has been set free and a burden has been lifted from my heart.^Praise be to the Most High God and His Son Yeshua!
Now that you have seen the power of God you know our message is true.^Now turn from your sins and believe in this good news to freely receive eternal life in Christ!
You were invited to stay with Lazarus and his sisters in Bethany.^Better get going!
Yeshua went ahead to pray with His disciples.^Safe travels, PNAME.
I'm searching for the perfect recipe for perfume!
Wow! This perfume is intoxicating!
I'm throwing a party, but I don't have anything to serve on the side!
This cheese is wonderful!
I'm practicing with my slingshot. Do you have any small stones?
I'll be a great shepherd one day, just like King David!
I have nothing to carry all the water I need to bring home!
The handles on these jugs will be a huge help! Thanks!
I need to take my fish to market in Bethany.^Could you help me load my carts?
Thanks for the help, friend!
When you pray, say…^Father in Heaven, your name is holy…
Your Kingdom come, your will be done,^On Earth as it is done in Heaven.
Forgive us of our sins, as we forgive others who sin against us,^and do not lead us into temptation, but save us from evil.
For the Kingdom, power, and glory is Yours forever. Amen.^My dear friends, ask and it will be given to you. Seek, and you will find.
Which of you parents would give your son a snake when he asks for a fish? No one!^Even more so, your Heavenly Father will give the Holy Spirit to those who ask Him!
Lord, John the Baptist taught his disciples to pray.^Please teach us how to pray, too!
Welcome to my home, PNAME!^Would you help my sister, Martha?^She's very upset that the house is such a mess...
Do you have any alms for a poor beggar like me?
Bless you for your generosity!
I'd rather have some grapes from the garden than matzo bread...
You're a handy person to have around, PNAME.
I'll be washing the disciples' robes while they stay here.^Could you gather them for me?
I'll start washing these dirty robes right away.
Someone could slip on the puddles in the other room!^We should wipe them up before someone gets hurt.
I would be mortified if Yeshua slipped on a puddle. Thanks for the help!
Lazarus offered to let Yeshua stay in the bedroom.^We need to get rid of the dust!
There! Yeshua has a spotless bedroom to sleep in.
Oh, my house is such a mess!^Would you be a dear and set the tables with bread?
Quick! I need to have the scrolls ready.^Yeshua is going to study scripture with me tonight!
May God shine His face upon you.
The sun will set before we have dinner.^Let's light the lamps so we aren't eating in the dark.
Bless you, friend!
I can't find the kitchen knives to make dinner...
These knives are just what I need!
I want to play dollies with my friends!
Hooray! We're going to have so much fun!
It's terrible! I had to sell all my jewelry to feed my children this week!
You are so kind! Please thank your friends for their compassion!
There's a hole in the wall.^I don't have any bricks to patch it up.
You make fine bricks, PNAME.
Finally, something got done.^Mary's lazy as always.^I can't stand my sister sometimes...
Our tables are filthy. Would you dust them off for me?
Wonderful! I wish my sister was as helpful as you, PNAME.
I have a lot of baking to do for such a big guest party.^I'll need some eggs from the chickens in the yard.
You have such a servant's heart!^Why am I stuck with such a lazy sister instead?
I'd like to make the disciples an extra set of robes.^I'll get it started if you fleece my sheep.
It's my pleasure to serve God with this gift to the disciples.
Mary! Why aren't you helping me with the chores?
Lord, am I supposed to do all the work myself?^Tell Mary to help me!
Martha, Martha. You are worried about many things, but only one thing is important.^Mary has chosen what is better, and I won't take that away from her.
I don't understand.^A miracle has happened but they deny it!^And now they threw me out!
Who is He?^Tell me and I will believe.
Beloved, He is the One standing in front of you.
Lord, I believe!
I have come to the World for judgment.^The blind will see and those who see will become blind.
What? Are we blind too?
Because you claim to see, you are guilty.
How can this man say "the Pharisees are blind"? They are our leaders!^He is mad! He must be possessed!
No, this man is right.^Can a demon make the blind see?^How can he do all these miracles if he is full of sin?
I'm collecting shoes for the destitute children of Jerusalem.
Thank you. I couldn't have done this without you.
This is wrong!^Let's find Yeshua. He'll know what to do.
PNAME, I accidentally broke some bowls at my neighbor's house.^I want to make amends and replace them.
Thanks for these bowls. Are they new?
Yeshua has had a lot of problems lately. Maybe I can help.^There's a valley outside the city. Come see me there sometime soon.
I've been crying for that poor man who was thrown out.^It doesn't seem right.^Do you have any handkerchiefs?
Thank you for the handkerchiefs.^I'm going to freshen up now.
Yeshua, come quick! ^The blind beggar you healed was cast out of the synagogue by the Pharisees!
delete this line
Very well, let's go set things right.
Do you believe in the Son of Man?
I don't understand.^A miracle has happened but they deny it!^And now they threw me out!
I'm collecting shoes for the destitute children of Jerusalem.
Thank you. I couldn't have done this without you.
This is wrong!^Let's find Yeshua. He'll know what to do.
PNAME, I accidentally broke some bowls at my neighbor's house.^I want to make amends and replace them.
Thanks for these bowls. Are they new?
Yeshua, come quick! ^The blind beggar you healed was cast out of the synagogue by the Pharisees!
Very well, let's go set things right.
I've been crying for that poor man who was thrown out.^It doesn't seem right.^Do you have any handkerchiefs?
Thank you for the Handkerchiefs.^I'm going to freshen up now.
Do you believe in the Son of Man?
Who is he, sir?^Tell me so that I may believe in him.
You have now seen him; in fact, he is the one speaking with you.
For judgment I have come into this world, so that the blind will see and those who see will become blind.
Lord, I believe.
What? Are we blind too?
If you were blind, you would not be guilty of sin; but now that you claim you can see, your guilt remains.
How can this man say that the pharisees are blind? They are our leaders!^He is mad! He is possessed!
This man is special. His words are not those of one possessed.^Can a demon make the blind see?^He has done many good works.^How can he do these things if he is full of sin?
Welcome to my humble home, PNAME.
Please fill the wash basin with water.^We must spiritually wash our hands before eating.
Thank you Lord, King of the Universe, Who sustains us.
We should decorate for our honored guest!^Why don't we set up the flower stands?
The flowers smell wonderful!
Would you please light the torches.^Tomorrow is Shabbat.
Praise you, Elohim, who lights our path.
How can I sample the delicious soup without a ladle?
Thank you for the ladle! I promise I'll wait for you before I sample.
The table is set.^Yeshua, come break bread with us.^Please make yourself at home.
He eats without even washing his hands!

You Pharisees clean the outside, but inside you are full of wickedness.^You foolish people!^The Creator made both the outside and the inside.^You tithe a tenth of everything, but you neglect justice and God's love!
Teacher, when you say these things, you are insulting all of us!
And you experts in the law...^Woe to you, because you load people with burdens they can't carry... ^And you don't lift a finger to help them!
My son wants to be a Temple guard one day.^I'm trying to collect arrowheads so he can practice his archery.
My son will be so excited!
The Temple needs new trumpets. ^Would you like to help me collect donations?
You found a lot of trumpets! The Temple will be very blessed.
I'm on a Daniel's Fast, so I can't eat meat or drink wine.^Do you have any vegetarian food?
Bless you, friend!^These roasted vegetables are wonderful!
Could you set the tables for the meal?^Everyone is hungry.
Watch out for that demon possessed man!
The people might start a stampede if we don't find a way to let them escape...
I can't find a safe way out! I'm so scared!
I hope no one gets hurt...
Do you have any porridge? I don't have any money for food.
Wow, thanks! The last person I asked went crazy like he was possessed.
I need to get away from that demon!
Save yourself!
I want to thank Yeshua for His help by crafting art but I don't have any scissors.
With these scissors I hope to design the finest paper cutting piece Yeshua has ever seen!
I need to get out of here! That man is going to hurt someone!
Thank you! Stay safe.
Today's events traumatized my son. Snacks make him feel better, but I have nothing to carry them.
These are perfect! Now I can run home quickly and bring him a feel good snack!
That posessed man threw my wife's jewelry in the water!
Elohim bless you! My wife will be so encouraged.
Oh good! These should do the trick.
My friend took my only cook knife in fear of the evil man. Do you have any extra?
Come out of him, Demon!
I'm healed! I can speak!
He casts out demons with the power of the Prince of Demons!
Yeshua, show us a sign from heaven.^Then we will know you are of God.

The Kingdom of Darkness cannot fight against itself, otherwise it would destroy itself.^But if I drive out demons by the Finger of God, then the Kingdom of God has come upon you.^He who isn't with me is against me, and he who does not gather with me, scatters.
Blessed is the woman who gave birth to you!
Rather those who hear God's Word and obey it are blessed.^This is a wicked generation!^You ask for a sign, but no sign will be given but the Sign of Jonah!
Rabbi, please join me in my home.^I would like you to eat with me and stay tonight.
Yeshua and the others are waiting up ahead.^I can't believe I have a chance to hear Yeshua preach!
Do you have anything to eat?^I'm worried I'll miss Yeshua teach if I go buy something.
You're a blessing from God! Thank you, stranger.
I'm baking a pie for the disciples.^Could you pick some peaches for me?
I hope they love this peach pie!
The crowds are going to trample all of my goods!^Hurry! We need to load them in my cart.
I can't stop worrying that my business will fail soon...
The people here haven't eaten anything.^Maybe we can pass out apples.
Great work, PNAME! I'll pass these out so the crowd has something to eat.
Beware of the "Yeast of the Pharisees", which is hypocrisy.^Everything hidden will be made known.^Soon, what you have said in the dark will be heard in the daylight.
My friends, don't be afraid of Man, who can kill your body.^Be afraid of God, who has authority to throw you into hell!
God takes care of the birds.^Aren't you worth much more than they are?^Don't be afraid of anything, because God loves you.^He has even counted the number of hairs on your head!
I did not come to bring peace on earth, but to divide.^Soon, even families will be divided because of me.
I wish I had a pumice stone. My feet are so itchy!
Wow, are these for me?^My feet will feel lovely after my pedicure!
I'm doomed! I'm out of fabric for my wedding dress!
This is the finest fabric I've even seen.^Did you really make this for me?
I'm teaching in a Synagogue nearby soon.^Let's get going, PNAME.
We need new sundials for our town.^The old ones were destroyed in a fire.
With these new sundials, our town is starting to recover!
My home was destroyed in a fire.^Do you have any cement blocks I can use to rebuild?
Thank you so much, PNAME!^Thanks to your kindness and Yeshua's words, I know God will always provide!
All this walking in the country is affecting my allergies.
Bless you! These handkerchiefs will make my day a lot easier.
Mary Magdalene invited you to watch Yeshua preach.^She's waiting for you in the countryside!
Yeshua is almost ready to start His teaching.^Let's help the Rabbis prepare the Synagogue while we wait.
We never finished our remodeling project.^Now the Synagogue has three unfinished mosaics...
Wow! You're very talented with your hands!
The visitors will cut their feet on all the broken glass unless someone cleans it up.
I'm glad that was taken care of. Wouldn't want someone cutting themselves.
The visitors could use a snack after the teaching.^Do you have any cookies?
These cookies smell wonderful!
I'm sorry, but I can't let you in the back without a note from the others.
The other members say you are very helpful.^Help yourself to the scroll rooms.
I need to feed my animals later.^But I'm out of grain...
Is this grain all for me? You're very generous, friend.
No one can concentrate on the teaching with all these spiders crawling about!
I can't stand a dirty Synagogue.^We need to start cleaning more often.
Our torches left a lot of ash on the ground.
Good thing you're here, PNAME.^Most of our members aren't the helpful sort.
Yeshua will need the scripture scrolls to begin his teaching.^Please grab them for me from the back.
Thank you, PNAME. Now we can begin.
I'm feeding the birds later, but I don't have a pouch to keep the feed in.
With these pouches, I can take friends on my bird feeding trip!
I'm taking a trip around Galilee to teach.^I wish I had a cloak or two to keep warm.
Your friends are so generous!^I didn't know how I was going to survive in the rain!
Some of the members would like to donate some vases to the Synagogue.
The Synagogue could really use some remodeling.^Thank you for your service with these vases.
Madam, please come forward.
Madam, you are set free from you infirmity.
Hallelujah! God has healed me!
Please, everyone. Go to Yeshua for healing during the week, not on Shabbat...
You hypocrites! Don't all of you water your donkeys on Shabbat?^Then shouldn't this Daughter of Abraham be set free from Satan's oppression on Shabbat?
That's right! What's so wrong with healing on Shabbat?
Healing is God's work. Why does it matter if it's on Shabbat?
The Kingdom of God is like yeast that a woman mixed with flour.^She kneaded the dough until the yeast was completely mixed in.
I want to set up flowers out here to show God our respect.
Elohim, King of the Universe, hear our prayers.
The wine cellar for the Synagogue needs new jars.^I just dropped the last one.
Are these jars brand new?
There's nowhere to sit around here. All the chairs are broken!
Bless you, stranger. I need to take a rest and sit down.
Thank you for joining me here, PNAME.^These people in Perea need to hear the Good News.
My stock of apples sold out in my store.
My apples are selling fast! I'm glad Yeshua is in town!
I'm so exhausted from fishing all night.^Would you be able to help me load my fish carts?
Now that I've had a chance to rest, I'll take my fish to the market.
These crowds knocked over my cabbage cart!^Someone, please help me pick them up!
You're a godsend, PNAME!
Do you have anything to eat?^I lost my home and I just spent my last coin...
These peaches are wonderful.^May God shine His face upon you!
My home hasn't been repaired in a while.^Do you have any bricks so I can fix it up?
That hole in my wall will be patched up in no time!
The Kingdom of God is near!^Those who have ears, let them hear!

You have the best recipe for fried fish I've ever tasted!
The town would like to donate fruit to Yeshua's ministry.^Could you please bring me boxes so I can carry the fruit?
This is fine work, PNAME.
My sheep haven't eaten today. Could you pass out the grain?
Yeshua is such a kind, generous man. I was so surprised by how loving He is.
Hello, I'm the mother of James and John.^I can't seem to find them. Can you help me?
james and john
NOT USED?
My mother is here? I've missed her so much!
It will be so good to finally see mother again.
Lord, we have a favor to ask.
Teacher, please do whatever we ask.
What do you want from me?
In your Kingdom, please let my two sons sit in places of honor next to you.^Place one on your right hand and the other on your left!
You don't know what you're asking!^Can you drink the cup of suffering I am about to drink?^Can you be baptized with the baptism I am about to have?
Yes, Lord. We can.
Why are you trying to get ahead of us?^Do you two brothers think you're better than the rest of us?
Then you will drink from the same cup.^But I can't give you what you ask. It isn't mine to give.^Only my Father may grant that honor.

For the Foreigners, they lord their authority over each other to stay in power.^But you will not do this.^Whoever wants to be the greatest among you must serve everyone.^Whoever wants to be first must be the slave of all.
Please help me! I need watering cans to fertilize my garden.
My spring garden is going to be dazzling!
I'm taking my son fishing today, but I can't find my fish hooks!
That was very kind of your friends.^Thank them for me when you get the chance!
We're all playing in the woods, but now we're hungry!
These cookies are yummy! Thank you!
With all these crowds pressing in, it will be hard to catch up with Yeshua.^Let's get going before they leave town!
There He is! I see Yeshua over there!
Praise to the King!
We love you, Yeshua!
Please visit Jericho again!
Yeshua, Son of David! Have mercy on us!
Be quiet, Bartimaeus.^The Messiah doesn't need to be troubled by you or your friend!
Lord! Son of David! Have mercy on us!
Wait. Bring those men here.
Cheer up! On your feet, the Messiah is calling you!
What do you want me to do for you?
We can see! Praise the God of Israel!
Lord, we want to see.
Go, receive your sight.^Your faith has healed you.
Hey, you! Where do you think you're going?
The Messiah is here. I want to see Him speak the words of Life.
The Messiah? Here?^The rumors must be true...^If I can just meet Him, maybe He'll have mercy on me...
This city is so windy! My tax forms are blowing away!
Oh, thank you so much. I'd lose my job if I lost those tax forms.
Jericho is so far from the sea, it gets very hot here even in spring.^Do you have any palm fronds so I can air out my house?
These palm fronds are perfect! Blessings, friend.
Pay up! This is tax season, and Zacchaeus will be angry if we don't meet our quota!
Very well, you can go about your business.^If you run into the Boss, watch your words...
I can't leave my gold lying out for anyone to steal...^But I'm too busy to leave my station right now...
Our tax supervisor is Zacchaeus. If I lost any of the collections, I'd be fired!
I'm not sure if I lost one of my abacuses...^Could you collect them for me?
Six ... seven ... eight! Good!^I have all them!
The peaches are ripe for eating.^We better pick them and send them to the market.
These peaches smell wonderful!
Could I bother for something to eat? I haven't had lunch.
This fish meal is delicious!
I have really bad allergies...^Do you have a handkerchief?
Wow! Thanks for all these handkerchiefs.^I'll be able to last all spring on these.
My pen isn't working!
There! I can finally finish my report.
I want to give something to Yeshua! Can you help?
Hooray! The flower garlands are pretty!
I don't know what to do… It's my only chance to see the Messiah.^But I'm too short to see over the crowd!
The crowd is burning up in this heat!^Why don't you see if the servants can fan them with palm branches?
Nice work. I don't want anyone fainting from the heat.
The last chisel set I bought was too cheap!^Do you know where I can get some quality chisels?
These chisels are fine works of craftsmanship!
I've got to ship these crates before my goods spoil.^Or I'll lose all my money!
I can't climb that tree by myself.^Let's make a rope ladder!
I owe you a favor, PNAME.
If you find me a palm frond, I'll fan these people to cool them off.
This should cool them off...
Someone could faint in this heat. Please bring me a palm branch.
This fan will definitely help...
It would be terrible if someone got sick from the heat!
Great idea! I'll fan these people to cool them down.
I'm training to be a shepherd!^But I need slingshots...
Hooray! I'm going to be the best shepherd ever!
Our town doesn't have sundials.^Do you know anyone who could donate some?
Praise the Lord! These sundials are beautiful!
I'll worship God with a song. Do you have a harp?
These harps are perfectly tuned! Bless you, friend.
I just want a chance to get a glimpse of the Messiah.^I know I'm not worthy to talk to Him...
Zacchaeus, come down right now.^I must stay at your house today.
What?! Yeshua is staying at the house of a sinner!
You there! Help me pack these crates!
Lord, I will give half of my possessions to the poor today.^Anybody I have cheated, I will pay them back four times the amount!^Please come stay at my house!
Bah! That man is a hypocrite!^Yeshua is a fool...
Today, salvation has come to this house, because this man is a Son of Abraham.
It's that suspicious Pharisee again.^I wonder what he's up to...
Yeshua's in town, but I haven't eaten yet.^Can you bring me a snack so my stomoch doesn't rumble while He teaches?
Your herb rolls are amazing!
I haven't eaten all day. I've been too busy working...
Wow! Are those apples for me?
I was hoping to enjoy the lovely taste of fried fish, but all the merchants are sold out!^There are just too many people here waiting for Yeshua...
Everyone is here to see Yeshua. Maybe I should see Him too...
If only there was a way to get him up higher…
That's it! I'll climb that tree over there!^PNAME, I need your help getting into that tree.
That suspicious Pharisee is up to something.^Let's follow and find out what they're plotting!
We need to get passed those guards!^Maybe I can get a disguise...
Good thinking, PNAME!^I'll change into this disguise and get passed those guards!
Oh, no...^I dropped my tax forms again.
That was very kind. Thank you!
If you do one of my chores, you can have this extra serving pitcher.^Please fill the green bags with apples.
Thanks for the favor. Here's the serving pitcher you wanted.
My little calves need their milk.
Aren't they adorable? They'll grow up big and heavy soon enough.
Halt! No one's allowed back there.^If you brought me firewood for my soldiers to chop, I might let you pass...
Alright. You seem like you won't cause any trouble.
If you prepare the horses for the patrol, you can borrow my extra servant's outfit.
That's one less chore for me.^Here's that extra outfit I promised.
No one is allowed in the house without a good reason!
I didn't realize you were a servant. Please go ahead.
Oh, I have so much to do...^I wish I had more time to finish washing the clothes!
Bless you, stranger! You're much kinder than those nasty Pharisees!
Those Pharisees and Priests trashed this place!
I wish the Pharisees would practice what they preach!
Back off. No one is allowed through until the Sanhedrin finish their meeting.
Hey! Who started that fire?
Money is tight lately. We need to snuff out those lamps to save energy.
If you see him, please give the High Priest my regards.
You, servant. Retrieve my scrolls from the scroll room.
Thank you. You may go.
I need to keep watch here.^I'm the last line of defense if that crazy prisoner breaks out...
He escaped again?!^Stop! In the Name of King Herod, stop right there!
What is it now?
Huge crowds are following Yeshua all over the countryside!^And everyone is talking about Lazarus being raised from the dead!
He may come to the Passover Feast to start a war...^We've got to stop Him!
We should kill Lazarus!
Quiet down! It's time to silence Yeshua and His followers.^We must begin our plan...
I'm going to a party! But I have no jewelry.
You're so generous! Bless you!
I promised my wife I would find new cloth for our worn out furniture.
I was having such trouble finding the right kind of cloth.^Thanks for your help.
I have a brilliant business idea...^Vases! Everyone loves vases.^Too bad I don't have any.
Are these for me? Wow!^My business will soar with such fine handiwork.
lemons done

eagle feathers done

The Messiah is here?Praise God!^Take the colt. I need to tell my family the good news!
I need my robe in that basket. But those dogs are dangerous!
Oh, you got my robe! Good idea with those meat slices!
It's almost lunchtime and there's nowhere to sit!
Great work on fixing up those chairs.
We'll be having soup and matzo bread for lunch.^Can you set the tables with bread?
The bread smells delicious!
I feel much better. Back to work!
I can't wait until lunch. Do you have something to eat?
We spilled the pots in the morning rush.^Could you pick them up?
Thanks! It's a lot easier to walk through this room now.
I'm too busy to cook lunch.^Can you make an egg soup?
Tastes great! You're a good cook.
Those thorn bushes are ruining our crops!
That was fast! I hope those bushes don't grow back...
We're behind schedule! Do you have sundials we can use to keep time?
The sundials will increase our productivity.^Here's the key to the treasure chest.
Pharaoh has declared we can go!^We must pack up quick and leave Egypt!^We will share our treasure if you help us pack.
Thank you for your help. Enjoy your portion of the treasure!
Our Cooking Pot has a hole in it, can you find us one to pack for the Exodus?
I need more olives for the trip, please help me pack.
Thank you! This pot is perfect!
Great! These will help us get far away from this place!
Yay! These jars are better than the old ones!
I broke the water jars!^Can you help me find new ones?
They're all gone? That's a relief.
Thanks for all the help!
El Shaddai bless you.
All those pests are frightening the flock! ^Please help me chase them away.
Help me fill the jugs with water,^then you can come into the garden.
All this packing is hard work!^Can you spare some food?
We need to fill those bags with vegetables for the trip. ^There are some ready to pick in the garden.
Someone broke our carts! We need to fix them before we leave.
Before we can go, please be sure the donkeys are all packed.
Wonderful! Now all we need to do is pack some cloth.
Do you know anything about the stolen sheep?
Hey, little guy. Are you lost? I saw your mother over there.
There you are! Your mother is looking for you.
Bless you, PNAME. I'm so glad my children are safe.^I wish I knew more, but I don't know anything that could help you.
Did that man really steal a sheep?
You found them! Bless you, PNAME.^I remember that those men have been arguing for years about a plot of land.
Thanks! This place is looking a lot better now.
The town square is a mess! Let's put the flower pot stands together
Do you know what happened between those two men?
PNAME, it's a good thing you're here!^The town Rabbi wants your help to sort out a dispute between neighbors.
I'm busy looking for my lost coins. Have you seen any gold coins around?
Where are my children? Have you seen my children?
I'm making a new sculpture, but I ran out of metal.^If you bring me some, I'll answer your questions.
I'm sorry, but I'm too hungry to think right now.
My market stalls were vandalized this morning!^If you fix them, I might have the time to help you.
I need a new dress. Do you have any white thread?
Oh, this thread is just right! My dress will be beautiful.
I'm expanding my garden and need seeds to get started.^Do your friends have any spare seeds?
Thank you for fixing my stalls!^I'm sorry, but I don't know anything about their argument.
These seeds will turn a good crop in the harvest.
These two men have been arguing about a stolen sheep.^But I can't tell who is lying.^Please speak to the witnesses so we know the whole story.
It will be dark soon. Let's light the torches so people can find their way home.
Oh...I had no idea. I guess I jumped to conclusions.^Please forgive me for slandering you.
Let's put our past behind us. We should start looking for your sheep.^He might be hurt.
Can't we all get along? Lying about someone else is a terrible thing to do.^Can you forgive him for judging you?
Thank you for clearing this up, PNAME. Please help yourself to the treasure chest.^Here is the key to the gate.
That man stole my sheep last night!
Excuse me, can I ask you a question?
PNAME, it's a good thing your here!^The town Rabbi wants your help to sort out a dispute between neighbors.
He's lying! I don't even own sheep. Why would I steal one?
The accuser is mistaken. His sheep wasn't stolen. It got lost in the woods last night.^We should go searching for it instead of arguing.
Thanks for lighting those torches!
Those apples were tasty!^One says that the other man stole a sheep, but I know it's not true.^I visited his house this morning.
Why are those men fighting?
This metal will be perfect!^I saw one of the sheep running off into the woods last night.^It probably got stuck in the bushes.
